title: The Story of a brownie scout troop
brief_description: Activities of a Brownie Troop in the United States. Field trips and outings develop a keen interest in the world about them, so each troop is encouraged to work as a group, planning its outings and activities. The planning of a country trip with the aim to gather specimens for troop subjects is shown in this film.
